articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: More than 700 killed as DR Congo military fights M23 rebels - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Rwanda-backed rebels capture eastern DRC’s largest city of Goma as conflict intensifies in the central African nation.
articles.content: At least 773 people have been killed in eastern Democratic Republic of the Congos (DRC) largest city of Goma and its vicinity in a week, amid fighting with Rwanda-backed M23 rebels who captured the c… [+1905 chars]
